Package org.apache.ambari.server.controller.metrics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MetricHostProvider  
    MetricPropertyProviderFactory
    The MetricPropertyProviderFactory is used to provide injected instances of PropertyProviders which retrieve metrics.
    MetricsServiceProvider  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectorHostDownRefreshCounter  
    MetricReportingAdapter  
    MetricsCollectorHAClusterState  
    MetricsCollectorHAManager  
    MetricsDataTransferMethod  
    MetricsDataTransferMethodFactory  
    MetricsDownsamplingMethod  
    MetricsDownsamplingMethodFactory  
    MetricsPaddingMethod  
    MetricsPropertyProvider  
    MetricsPropertyProviderProxy  
    MetricsReportPropertyProvider  
    MetricsReportPropertyProviderProxy  
    RestMetricsPropertyProvider
    Resolves metrics like api/cluster/summary/nimbus.uptime For every metric, finds a relevant JSON value and returns it as a resource property.
    ThreadPoolEnabledPropertyProvider
    Unites common functionality for multithreaded metrics providers (JMX and REST as of now).
    ThreadPoolEnabledPropertyProvider.Ticket
    Ticket used to cancel provider threads.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MetricsPaddingMethod.PADDING_STRATEGY  
    MetricsServiceProvider.MetricsService
    Enumeration to distinguish metrics service installed for a cluster
